import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const DetailScreen = () => { const params = useParams() const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ 'id': 1 }) const findUserById = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/${params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(userDetails => setUserDetails(userDetails)) useEffect(findUserById, []) const [post, setPost] = useState({}) const findAllPost = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(p => setPost(p)) useEffect(findAllPost, []) const postsByThisUser = Object.values(post).filter(p => p.userId === userDetails.id); const [newPost, setNewPost] = useState({}) const deletePostClickHandler = (post) => { console.log(post.id); fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/${post.id}`, { method: 'DELETE', }); } const [album, setAlbum] = useState('') const findAlbums = () => fetch(`https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/albums/`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(album => setAlbum(album)) const albumByThisUser = Object.values(album).filter(a => a.userId === userDetails.id) useEffect(findAlbums, []) return ( <>

    {post.title} deletePostClickHandler(post)} className="fas fa-times fa-pull-right">
    {post.body}
    ) }

  • {album.title}
    • ) }
) } export default DetailScreen
